page.title: 07Churches in Carlton
page.content: In Carlton there are five different types of Churches of all shapes and sizes.Another thing about the churches is that they are either on Carlton Hill or Church Street.The oldest and largest Church is the Carlton Parish Church which is 101 years old. The newest Church is probably the Baptist Church on Church Street. There is a Catholic church that looks quite new but next door to it is the original church which is now used for a playschool.As well as services on Sunday nearly all the churches have things going on during the week for example the Methodist church on Carlton Hill as a womans bright hour at sometime during the week.Another thing is that there is only christian places of worship in Carlton.But at the other end of Carlton Hill there is a Hindu temple.
